header.introText: Hi I’m Boularand Killian, a 18-year-old young man passionate about Web technologies and Entrepreneurship. Ready to take this journey with me to discover my personal world and what I do?

aboutMe.introText: For the past two years, I have immersed myself in the world of coding and interface design, a passion that began as soon as I discovered the endless possibilities of the digital world. I am currently a student at L'Ecole By CCI Haute-Savoie, studying in the digital field, where I continue to develop my skills in a dynamic and innovative environment. Before that, I earned a high school diploma in STIDD, (Sciences and Technologies of Engineering and Sustainable Development), a program that provided me with a solid foundation in engineering and sustainable development—fields that still influence my projects today.
aboutMe.goal: My goal is to combine my technical and creative knowledge to become an entrepreneur in the tech industry, where I can create solutions that push the boundaries of innovation and efficiency.

form.descr: To turn your vision into reality.
